testcase.name: testDeletar
testcase.system-out: Hibernate: drop table if exists Aluno cascade Hibernate: drop table if exists Emprestimo cascade Hibernate: drop table if exists Publicacao cascade Hibernate: create table Aluno ( matriculaAluno integer generated by default as identity, nome varchar(255), primary key (matriculaAluno) ) Hibernate: create table Emprestimo ( aluno_id integer, dataDevolucao date, dataEmprestimo date, id integer generated by default as identity, publicacao_id integer, primary key (id) ) Hibernate: create table Publicacao ( ano integer not null, codigoPub integer generated by default as identity, autor varchar(255), tipo varchar(255), titulo varchar(255), primary key (codigoPub) ) Hibernate: alter table if exists Emprestimo add constraint FKj8wph1uj1a4t5mjej9huvo699 foreign key (aluno_id) references Aluno Hibernate: alter table if exists Emprestimo add constraint FKnr3t00yqgs84taswbkfuo48ld foreign key (publicacao_id) references Publicacao Hibernate: insert into Aluno (nome, matriculaAluno) values (?, default) Hibernate: insert into Publicacao (ano, autor, tipo, titulo, codigoPub) values (?, ?, ?, ?, default) Hibernate: insert into Emprestimo (aluno_id, dataDevolucao, dataEmprestimo, publicacao_id, id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, default) Hibernate: delete from Emprestimo where id=? Hibernate: select e1_0.id, a1_0.matriculaAluno, a1_0.nome, e1_0.dataDevolucao, e1_0.dataEmprestimo, p1_0.codigoPub, p1_0.ano, p1_0.autor, p1_0.tipo, p1_0.titulo from Emprestimo e1_0 left join Aluno a1_0 on a1_0.matriculaAluno=e1_0.aluno_id left join Publicacao p1_0 on p1_0.codigoPub=e1_0.publicacao_id where e1_0.id=? Hibernate: drop table if exists Aluno cascade Hibernate: drop table if exists Emprestimo cascade Hibernate: drop table if exists Publicacao cascade
